site.name: Prezio

site.description: Design personalized gift boxes with curated items, beautiful packaging, and heartfelt messages. Make every moment unforgettable.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: See what our community has to say

items.name: Sarah M.
items.text: I sent my best friend a custom birthday box and she literally cried. The presentation was stunning and every item felt so thoughtful.

items.name: James R.
items.text: We use Prezio for all our client appreciation gifts. The quality is consistent and the customization options are incredible.

items.name: Emily K.
items.text: The bridal party boxes I created were a huge hit. Everyone loved the attention to detail and the beautiful packaging.

items.name: David L.
items.text: As someone who's terrible at gift-giving, this app was a lifesaver. The suggestions were spot-on and the process was effortless.

about.title: About Prezio
about.subtitle: We believe every gift should tell a story

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Prezio was born from a simple idea: gift-giving should be joyful, not stressful. We noticed that people often struggle to find the right gift, spend hours searching online, and still end up unsure if their choice will bring a smile.
story.p2: So we built a platform that guides you through the process ‚Äî from choosing the occasion to crafting a heartfelt message. Every item in our catalog is handpicked for quality and thoughtfulness.
story.p3: Whether you're celebrating a birthday, saying thank you, or just letting someone know you care, Prezio makes it easy to create something truly special.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To make personalized gifting accessible, delightful, and meaningful for everyone.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Every item we offer passes our strict quality standards.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Eco-friendly packaging options and responsible sourcing.

personalization.title: Personal Touch
personalization.description: No two gift boxes should be the same. Yours is unique.

joy.title: Spreading Joy
joy.description: Our ultimate goal is to put a smile on someone's face.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Prezio

items.question: How does the Gift Box Builder work?
items.answer: Our step-by-step builder guides you through choosing an occasion, selecting items, customizing packaging, writing a personal message, and previewing your box ‚Äî all in a beautiful, intuitive interface.

items.question: Is this a real e-commerce platform?
items.answer: Prezio is currently a design showcase and demo. The builder is fully functional for designing boxes, but no real payments or shipments are processed. Think of it as a preview of what's possible!

items.question: Can I save my designs?
items.answer: Yes! You can save your gift box designs to your browser's local storage. Visit the 'My Designs' page to manage, rename, duplicate, or delete your saved creations.

items.question: What occasions do you support?
items.answer: We support a wide range of occasions including birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day, Christmas, Halloween, graduation, new baby, thank you, get well, weddings, housewarming, and 'just because' gifts.

items.question: Can I customize the packaging?
items.answer: Absolutely! Choose from three box sizes (Small, Medium, Large), three packaging styles (Classic, Luxury, Eco-Friendly), and multiple color themes and patterns.

items.question: Do you offer eco-friendly options?
items.answer: Yes! Our Eco-Friendly packaging tier uses 100% recycled and sustainable materials. It's naturally beautiful and kind to the planet.

items.question: Is there a minimum order value?
items.answer: Our Starter tier begins at $25 per box, which includes the box, up to 3 items, and classic packaging. There's no minimum beyond choosing a tier.

items.question: Can I include a personal message?
items.answer: Of course! Our gift card step lets you write a custom message with tone presets (heartfelt, funny, formal, romantic, casual) or compose your own. Character limit is generous at 500 characters.

items.question: Is the site available in other languages?
items.answer: Prezio is available in English, Turkish, and Polish. You can switch languages anytime using the language selector in the header.

items.question: How do I share my design with someone?
items.answer: Currently, designs are saved locally in your browser. A share feature via link or social media is planned for a future update.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Prezio is a demonstration application. This privacy policy is provided for completeness.

**Information We Collect**
This demo application stores only your preferences (theme, language) and saved gift box designs in your browser's local storage. No personal data is sent to any server.

**Cookies & Local Storage**
We use browser local storage to persist your theme preference, language selection, and saved designs. No tracking cookies are used.

**Third-Party Services**
This site may use Google Fonts for typography. No analytics or tracking services are active.

**Data Retention**
All data is stored locally on your device. You can clear it at any time through your browser settings.

**Contact**
For any questions about this policy, please use our contact form.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
Prezio is a demonstration and portfolio project. These terms are for illustrative purposes.

**Acceptance**
By accessing Prezio, you agree to these terms.

**Service Description**
Prezio is a frontend demonstration of a gift box building experience. No real products are sold, no payments are processed, and no deliveries are made.

**Intellectual Property**
The design, code, and content of this site are created for demonstration purposes.

**Limitation of Liability**
This is a non-commercial demo. No warranties or guarantees are made regarding the service.

**Changes**
These terms may be updated at any time without notice.

**Contact**
For questions, please use our contact form.
